name: Object Builder VR
description:
In Object Builder VR, you can create anything you want. To make an object, simply drag any part from the supply bay and place it wherever you want. From race cars to space ships, the only true limit is your imagination!

Credits: 

-  Alec Guarino  - Team Lead, Programmer 

-  Rick Velez - Game Designer 

-  Will Varsalona - Artist 

-  Sam Jacobs - Sound Designer/Composer
